## Description {#details}

Represents a solution to a <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pbqp">PBQP</a> problem.

To get the selection for each node in the problem use the getSelection method.

Definition at line 26 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/pbqp/solution-h">Solution.h</a>.
